website_summaries.verdict: TOMS Payton earned the recognition of many users, thanks to its comfortable and lightweight feel. It is one of TOMS’ stylish casual sneakers that can be worn with almost anything. Additionally, the shoe’s cushioning system and removable sockliner also received wonderful praises from many.Contrariwise, some users were disappointed about the irregular sizing of this sneaker. Also, the upper caused blisters to a few disappointed owners. Nonetheless, it has received more pros than cons making it a worthy investment if you are looking for a comfortable and versatile sneaker for the streets.
pros: Most owners described the TOMS Payton as a very comfortable shoe even for extended use
Some wearers commended the shoe’s lightweight nature
Many sneakerheads liked the colors of the shoe
A good number of buyers were happy that they can pair this shoe with almost any outfit
Several commenters mentioned that the TOMS Payton sneaker is a great looking casual shoe
This shoe has a good amount of cushioning, according to some consumers
Numerous users welcomed the fact that this shoe can be worn with or without the laces
A few users appreciated the inclusion of the removable insole because they can replace it with orthotic ones
cons: One TOMS Payton review stated that this shoe is not very breathable
Some people complained about getting blisters on the right heel
A few people noticed that this shoe runs small

customer_reviews.title: Read this review ASAP
customer_reviews.text: This is a misleading item, so trust me and read this review. It’s labeled on amazon as “Toms classic women’s shoes” but it’s actually going to arrive as men’s sizing. The price is decent but the listing makes you think you need to order a woman’s size that will add up to what you want to wear as a male. Turns out they shipped me a men’s size 10 for a women’s product after all...
customer_reviews.author: Justin R. Michaelson

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: I was always curious about Toms shoes. So many people I saw had them and after a few years, I finally decided to join the bandwagon. I chose a fairly neutral blue to match much of my wardrobe. As previous reviewers have said, I agree that they are (oddly enough) very comfortable for quite a simplistic shoe. The first day I wore them, however, I did get red marks on the top of my foot (from the “triangle” section), but I wore them again the next day and didn’t. I figured I just needed to loosen them up a bit. Overall, I’m pleased with my purchase. I wouldn’t buy them full price, but I’d wait for another deal.
customer_reviews.author: Annagram

customer_reviews.title: yet they looked like Toms. I wondered if they were fakes
customer_reviews.text: So these came too small, different sole, different.... everything... yet they looked like Toms. I wondered if they were fakes. But maybe I just had to break them in again? I stared at the box, it looked legit, even though my old ones didn't come in a box (got them at Urban Outfitters). Something was just off, and too much of it. Then I went online and read the reviews... my hunch was right. These are fakes. I don't know how they were able to manipulate their reviews or how they're still on here, but I'm so glad I caught this in time!
customer_reviews.author: Bobby

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! True to size. Picture is showing the already a little beat up but I literally wear them to run errands, work he yard, you name it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of these shoes, but the quality is absolutely terrible. These shoes squeak like crazy and it's really obnoxious. I have two pairs, unfortunately, because I thought they would last. One is a 13 and one is a 12 (in black) as I am right in between sizes. Therefore, I can rule out it being a 'fit' issue. It's definitely the shoe. Additionally, I've worn these maybe 7 times and had them for just over a month and the material is already tearing. It'll be another couple of wears before they are complete trash. The seller should do the right thing and replace them.
customer_reviews.author: The Big Smooth

customer_reviews.title: Run a little small, but love these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love my TOMS! They run a little small so I had to return the original size I bought for a bigger size, but these fit great (I’m usually a 9 but had to buy a 10 in those shoes). At first they feel a little tight, especially around the toe box, but after using them a few times they stretch out and fit your feet better. These are my go to goes to go out and about like grocery shopping, etc. They are comfortable and love that I can just slip them on without having to tie any laces. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Neubauer

customer_reviews.title: It's a woman's shoe, but I think it's men's sizing
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. They look amazing, and I think they will be comfortable when I get the right size, but I ordered size 9 and they are HUGE. I mean, gun boat huge. I could probably wear my slippers inside them and still have space. Unfortunately, I bought them for a trip to Mexico, and the first order took so long to arrive, there's no chance the replacements will be here on time. Also, returns are a bit of a pain in the butt with this company, after I've gotten used to Prime returns. But when I finally get my replacement pair, I'll update this review.
customer_reviews.author: Reader X

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow the size is not accurate as standard size
customer_reviews.text: I am very disappointed in the size I followed the size chart I get my size 8 (25cm) my feet fits with difficulty although there is a space in the length but it is very narrow it is written on it 8 W although I ordered regular size and still very narrow ...I wish I could return it but I do not live in USA a friend received for me ... unfortunately waste of money ...I do not advise to size up because it will be bigger in length and still narrow
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Elsayed

customer_reviews.title: Classic Toms
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked Toms' shoes for a classic everyday running around or staying at home footwear. They are simple, fit great (once you get the right size-I ordered 1 size smaller) and you have to love the colors they come in. I have had about 6 pairs so far-after wear and tear you have to dispose of but they do last. Besides the great selection I love the fact that they give free shoes to those that are less fortunate-that alone is a great reason to buy Toms. I do recommend Toms' and will be ordering another pair come fall.
customer_reviews.author: cee

customer_reviews.title: They do not fit
customer_reviews.text: I'm normally a size 8 for Tom's and most other brand shoes. These say size 8 but I can't even get my foot in. Other Toms shoes are comfortable and are amazing when broken in, but these have a stiff plastic material that doesn't have any give. Disappointed and I feel misled about the sizing. The attempt at matching the woven jute looking material with the plastic is also weird. It doesn't look good in person. It is a shame because I like the shade of pink / color it came in but it's not even wearable
customer_reviews.author: Keffer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have two other pairs of Toms--the classic style in black and the natural burlap style in slightly sparkly gold/beige. They're both very comfortable but kinda boring. These are comfortable but less boring for the super cute black/charcoal dots fabric and huarache soles. I've gotten many compliments on these shoes unlike the other two pairs. I feel stylish in these shoes and my feet are happy, too, 'cuz they're in Toms!
customer_reviews.author: NOLA77382

customer_reviews.title: TOMS are the comfiest, easiest shoes ever !
customer_reviews.text: I LOOOVEEE these shoes. The last time I bought Toms was in 2010 and they’ve definitely made their shoes comfier with better support over the years. These shoes are so nice because they mold to your feet and are made of durable fabric in my opinion. I’m on my feet running around all day at work and these Toms really keep up with me. I’ll definitely be buying more colors since I haven’t touched any of my dozens of shoes since getting these.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Can remove Insole to fit
customer_reviews.text: I always wear a women's 7 and I ordered a 7 toms shoe and it was TOO TIGHT... my feet were so uncomfortable ALTHOUGH I realized that I could remove the insole from this shoe (not like most shoes) which made it very easy to fit my foot in the shoe. without the original insole my foot fits perfectly in the shoe and I went to my local Walgreen's and purchased the Walgreens brand Insole (cut to fit your size feet) which is THIN and COMFORTABLE... the thin insole makes it so my feet fit in the shoe and is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Young

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive shoes, match everything!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing. I was worried they would make my feet look too big, Size 9, but they don't. They are very attractive and they match with everything! I got the Morning Dove Heritage Canvas, a lighter grey color. Oh, and they are cushiony and really comfortable. I got compliments on them right away! I ordered in a size 9, which is my typical size and they fit just right.
customer_reviews.author: This.Is.Greta

customer_reviews.title: Fit is smaller and much more norrow.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not like my other toms. While I love the design. They fit way smaller than my others in the same size. Still hoping they will strech some. The insole is much thicker and is removable, not sure if this is a new design or like others have said a fake. I Judy wish they wound have fit like all my other ones. Definitely a disappoint
customer_reviews.author: Little Bean

customer_reviews.title: cheap
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely cheaply made. I have bought "fake tons" in the past but decided to spring for the real thing. After 5 weeks, exactly 1 week past the return window, the cloth had frayed on the toe. These are not my every day shoes so I have probably worn them 10 or 15 times. They are basically garbage now as the thin "canvas" has frayed and really can't be sewn without looking terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Kandahar

customer_reviews.title: LEGIT TOMS
customer_reviews.text: These are legit TOMS shoes, they arrived new in the original box and with tags. What a bargain at $35 rather than the regular $50 price on TOMD website. Would definitely recommend this item from this seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Monroe

customer_reviews.title: FAKE TOMS ALERT
customer_reviews.text: Again, I should've listened to the reviews! This is the 2nd pair of FAKE Toms I've received TODAY!! The only difference with this fake pair is that they're too big. So if you read the reviews that say they're mens sizes I believe they're right. I have dozens of pairs of Toms and I know a fake. See the pic?? The insoles shouldn't come out like that. Keep searching cuz these are fake trash and im returning yet another pair of counterfeit shoes.
customer_reviews.author: M$fortune

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, the padding just don’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable shoes. I’ve bought them a few times now for travel when I’m walking a lot per day, but also want to look cute. They are great for that but I gave them a 4 because I wear them out each season even though I have many shoes in my rotation. These wear out quicker than any I’ve ever owned in the padding. They are well made though and I keep coming back for more.
customer_reviews.author: MA

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I expected, but maybe better
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never owned a pair of Toms before. I saw this design & had to have them. I would say my feet are usually a 7 1/2, but lately I’ve been experimenting with size 8 and find I like the little bit of extra room. The shoes are solid, the presentation and color is vibrant. I’m also happily surprised at how comfortable the insoles are, and the shoe as a whole.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Great daily shoe
customer_reviews.text: Have worn Toms for years. They have all fit me the same and I gladly purchase online. I used these for casual wear to match up with outfits, but after breaking my foot, I can no longer comfortably go barefoot around the house. So my Toms shoes are my daily indoor shoe. They feel fine on me and I think they are cute. I do rotate them just like other cloth and leather shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T.

customer_reviews.title: Good for short periods of time. Painful!
customer_reviews.text: As usual, Toms are a little small, but the Rust Multi Strip Woven ones I got (super cute) I swear the sole of the shoe is so skinny, no adult female should be able to wear them. The fabric stretches fine, but the whole side of my foot is hanging off the edge of the insole, and rubs against the edge and ends up raw by the end of the day. Nothing feels better than taking these things off! They're super cute but NOT an all day shoes and NOT a walking shoe. Run to the store with them or go to the lake where you can take them off for the rest of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but sizing runs large
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfortable, with a nice squishy sole. I wear size 7, so that's what I ordered. I had some extra room at the toe (which can be a good thing), but the heel (back of the shoe) was so wide I couldn't walk without them flip-flopping off the backs of my feet. So, I am returning and ordering down a size to 6.5. Fingers crossed they will fit :) because they really are a nice shoe
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie Young

customer_reviews.title: I’ll Stick With Bobs Instead
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear Bob’s in this same style. I ordered my usual size 9 and these are much smaller. Cannot wear with socks at all. Very tight. And of course, size 9.5 is not available. In the listing it shows the black ones having a white sole but the ones I received had a black sole (not what I wanted). Super disappointed and returning them.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brewer

customer_reviews.title: Kinda cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I order these hoping for a Tom shoe that was a little less pricey than what’s on their website. However when I opened these I immediately felt like they were cheap looking and cheaply made. I’m not sure if they were knock offs or not as I don’t have much experience with Toms shoes but regardless of being authentic or fake, I didn’t feel this shoe was worth the money spent. So they went back.
customer_reviews.author: Heather E.

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit tight at first
customer_reviews.text: I must be used to my worn-in Toms because these were extremely tight upon putting them on. I wore them around the house for a few days (both with and without the removable insole) to loosen them up a bit. They are fitting better after a few hours of wear. They are a great color, they feel comfortable after breaking them in on the top of the shoe, and I love them. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Far too narrow
customer_reviews.text: Way way too small. I could not even get them on. I ordered my normal size (in other shoes; I have never worn Tom’s) and was very disappointed. The store that sent the item was great tho, and even included a free pair of socks (which I sent back with the shoes, as it would have been wrong to keep them.)
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Bratzel

customer_reviews.title: Like a glove, though I did break them in at home
customer_reviews.text: I have funky, small feet (6.5) and my right foot is slightly wider than my left. It was a pretty rock solid shoe at first but wear it around the house for a day and they’re pretty comfy! I’m a fan, but be leary cause I know Toms does not work for everyone. Be careful with the pinky toes wide-feet peeps!
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Delvalle

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Easy to Clean
customer_reviews.text: I've always eyeballed TOMS shoes and never got a pair until recently because my other set of flats finally wore out. The Dahlia Purple is a gorgeous color and I love how the shoes required no break-in time at all, they were comfortable without socks and I wear them for quick errands and after a nice workout at the gym. My LO got mud on them when we were out for a walk and the shoes were good as new after a wipe down.
customer_reviews.author: Appleberry

customer_reviews.title: Odd fit
customer_reviews.text: I have 5 pairs of classics - all 7.5 - so I assumed I would be the same in these. They felt a tad loose but I thought it was probably just different material. After a few wears they feel too big, more like a size 8. I’ll probably try to wear liners with them or something to help with blisters. The color is pretty, but I’m not impressed with the fit at all. Will be sticking to the classics...
customer_reviews.author: J+H B

customer_reviews.title: Not your typical Toms shoes
customer_reviews.text: Bummed - I owe three pairs of Toms that I love and this is a very different product. The shoe was wide - most Toms are narrow which I love but these now don't fit - also they ran a little long for size 8. Every pair of Toms I have feel so soft and cozy due to the fabric but these Tom's material hurt my feet so stiff and uncomfortable just trying them on - incredibly disappointed - wondering if maybe these really are not Toms
customer_reviews.author: Julie Warren

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Tom's aren't known for their great arch support, so, no surprise there. These seem like the real deal, but, I wouldn't really know, this being my first pair. The canvas is of excellent quality. They're comfy, but, I'm worried they'll stretch. Wish I'd got a 1/2 size down. They fit perfectly, tho. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: 💇 2dpoint

customer_reviews.title: Men’s shoe advertised as women’s shoe
customer_reviews.text: This shoe was advertised as a women’s shoe, however when I placed the order it said “men’s”. I went ahead and waited to see what I got, and it was indeed labeled as a men’s shoe. They are too big, but they will be used lore for knocking around the house so I plan on just sucking it up and using them.
customer_reviews.author: Lmc

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable shoes, a little tight at first
customer_reviews.text: Love my Toms! They do run a little small (I had to go up a size than what I usually wear), but I think it’s just because of the material and shape. The toe box is a little tight at first, but stretches out with use and gets more comfortable. They are my go to shoes when going out and about; I love that they are fast and easy to slip on and I don’t have to tie anything. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Neubauer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic Toms
customer_reviews.text: I was a little concerned at some of reviews stating that the shoes are knock-offs but decided to take a chance. I got the stone brown seuded shoe. I have been wearing Toms for years and probably have more than a dozen pairs. These are most definitely Toms. The fit is spot on and they feel like bedroom slippers right out of the box. They're my new favorite shoes
customer_reviews.author: SMK

customer_reviews.title: So ugly!
customer_reviews.text: I just tried on these shoes, and the toe profile looks like my toes are jammed up in the front. Shapeless, lumpy, horrible, no support. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Loladrum

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two colors of Toms, both in a size seven. One was too tight and one fit just right. Fortunately, with these ones I was able to fill them bags of water and stretch them out in the freezer but I found it odd that there was such a significant difference in sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha S

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are EVERYTHING. ❤
customer_reviews.text: I've been coveting these shoes for so long, but I couldn't find my size. They popped up in my suggested items & I was so excited! They are so so comfortable & they look amazing. They go with everything & I have gotten several compliments already. I can't say enough good things about these Tom's!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of 3

customer_reviews.title: These are men’s shoes.  Don’t believe the description
customer_reviews.text: It’s ridiculous to search for women’s shoes, order a size that shows it’s a women’s size, and receive men’s shoes.
customer_reviews.author: readerteacher

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow
customer_reviews.text: I could not get my foot in these and I ordered up a half size because shoes like this a little on the loose side. Nope. I have 3 other Tom's, one this style and two other wedge styles and they all fit perfectly. These were too narrow but they did issue a refund
customer_reviews.author: Connie D. Hill

customer_reviews.title: As expected!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. I’m a 7 1/2 and ordered 7 1/2 and they fit perfectly. Originals, love the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Argcc

customer_reviews.title: It hurts my instep (size 6.5)
customer_reviews.text: Super cute shoes! Too bad it's too tight and hurts my instep :( If I take out the insole, it fits perfectly fine but then that's too thin, it'd hurt my feet so I'd have to leave it in. I'll still keep it but wish it was a little bit bigger or would stretch.
customer_reviews.author: The Buffalos

customer_reviews.title: First pair of Tom's - worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive this product via discount, obtain for free nor false rating promotion of this item. All reviews are from my personal critque. To look good, wear no socks unless they are the socks that solely cover your toes a sn expose the top of your feet. One of the MOST comfortable shoes, most stylish, and lightest shoes I have ever worn. I have received numerous compliments and have always enjoyed putting them on. I have had these for 3 months now and haven't regretted my purchase since. Can't wait for my next pair!
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: super cute!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! The price is great. The yellow is very golden, not a true yellow. I have received tons of compliments. At first I got them because it was a unique color but because of the golden hue, they've matched quite a bit of stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Not Authentic or Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not an authentic Toms. It has zero features of real Toms. No arch support, foot bed comes out - not stitched in and no design on inside. I wore these on a walk around the block and had severe blisters on the back of my feet. Extremely disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: BHFO sells knockoffs
customer_reviews.text: BHFO is the seller I received my Toms from, they came in different style, and color than pictured. They were two different sizes and knockoffs! The insoles came completely out of the shoe. They charge Toms brand pricing for cheap shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Norris

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the ease of a slip on and comfort, but after only 5 months of light use there is very noticeable wear above the sole where the fabric is ripping and separating. These weren’t exactly cheap and I had a higher expectation of quality from Toms brand. Was not expecting having to replace in 5 months. Really disappointed as the return window has closed as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mah7772

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Toms
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get these in the mail and when I did I was elated with the color and comfortable fit. I wear a 5.5 shoe and ordered the same. Perfect! The color is gorgeous and very versatile. I ordered the Cognac Suede. I’m so pleased with this purchase and highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Real TOMS! Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Real TOMS! I ordered the Majolica blue color and they are so beautiful. This was my first time ordering TOMS off amazon, so I was a little skeptical. I have tons of pairs that I get off the TOMS website or the mall, but this will be my new favorite place to get new ones. I ordered a 9.5 (I usually wear a 10 for other shoes) and it fits perfectly. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: rpierre14

customer_reviews.title: defective/not real Toms
customer_reviews.text: this was a defective pair and i can't send it back since i traveled with it. i went to try it on and one foot fit perfectly (just like my other Toms) and the other foot was 1-2 sizes lower even though it stated the correct size in the shoe
customer_reviews.author: ath

customer_reviews.title: my mom needed a wider shoe with arch support
customer_reviews.text: I initially purchased this shoe for myself but did not realize it was a W so I gave them to my aged mom - the support is good for her, and the sole keeps her from slipping when walking. I was drawn to the colors, material, and design
customer_reviews.author: KscK

customer_reviews.title: I love my Toms
customer_reviews.text: I buy a new pair of Toms slip on sneakers ever summer. They’re cute, comfortable and at a good price point. I usually wear a size 9 in street shoes and 9.5 in running shoes. I take an 8.5 in Toms. The canvas will stretch.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great fit but defective shoe
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I cannot give 5 stars is because these specific pair were defective (left shoe only). The heel part kept nudging my left ankle which was super annoying and eventually felt like it was bruised. Couldn’t break them in whatsoever so I had to return them today. I just purchased another pair because they are very comfortable and black goes with almost anything.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Bobby

customer_reviews.title: A little too roomy
customer_reviews.text: I like these shoes—pretty color and comfortable. But they’re bigger than expected, and the heel slips when I walk. I’ll need to add an insert to keep them on my feet, which is disappointing. If I could do it again, I’d order a half size down.
customer_reviews.author: T-mo

customer_reviews.title: Good product - wrong size
customer_reviews.text: I love Tom's and wear them alot. But in this order I was sent the wrong size. I didn't use them for awhile so I didn't discover it until now and the window to return them is past. This is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Size 9
customer_reviews.text: I have three other pairs of TOMS and the fit perfect. I always order a size 9. These came in and I tried them on for the day. I am a teacher so I am on my feet all day. These were a slight bit tighter. I’ve worn them 3 times already and they are still tight.
customer_reviews.author: Ilda Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Falling Apart After 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved these, but in only a few months they are literally falling apart. This is with light/moderate wear, walking on pavement and sand. I am very disappointed with the quality of these shoes, especially since I live in Egypt and imported these with a friend because I didn’t want to buy a cheap pair of shoes in Cairo as the quality is not great. After all that effort, I find that these are just as bad if not worse than the cheap shoes at the Souk here. The braided trim is coming off completely and the sole has separated, as in the photos. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amaria

customer_reviews.title: Canvas tore quickly
customer_reviews.text: This is the 5th pair of Toms that I have owned. I love how they fit. I noticed that the material of this pair was much stiffer than my previous pairs. They have not wore well at all. After a month of wearing them about twice a week the right pair has a tear in the material. The canvas simply wore through just above the heel. I hope this was just a defect with the pair that I received.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolle A. Chesshir

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting. These are not my 1st pair of Tom's so I knew I wasn't getting a hiking or running shoe level of support but they are still great for walking around all day without pain. I love the color and the fabric is surprisingly not as stiff as you'd think for canvas. Completely happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HBK

customer_reviews.title: Quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very Happy with purchase. I dont buy street type shoes often as I mostly go with just cross trainers but these are great looking and dont have any areas where i dont like the fit or having any slippage or rubbing issues; seem to really mold on my foot but that may not be the case with your foot. 10.5 size fit as expected and imo are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Lane

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but durable
customer_reviews.text: I love TOMS! The fact that these have a rubber bottom made me very excited. I always wear out the heel of the fabric. The shoes fit as expected and look great. But they are much heavier than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not as comfortable as the fabric style.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the grey woven/lace style shoe. I wore them today for the first time. While I like the looks, they are rubbing my feet in the areas of a seam. I've had other Tom's and just love them, however those are the fabric type, whereas this is more of a firm, polyester (almost plastic) feel. These just aren't as comfortable as the others. Size was spot on! They look exactly like the picture. Arrived quickly.
customer_reviews.author: MargRN

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy, and slippery!
customer_reviews.text: These are so cute! Comfortable with orthotics in them. It the surface of the sole is so slippery! I have been trying to rough up the surface. It’s a little better, but be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this style of Tom's shoes for years. This pair is not up to par. Left shoe is larger than the right one and heel slips on both shoes. Color is nice. But disappointed with the fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda M.

customer_reviews.title: Cute but need to size up 1/2 size
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the Star Wars fan! Cute shoes but you need to size up a half size. I wear womens 5 in every Toms shoe (have probably 10 pairs) and these are the only ones that are snug.
customer_reviews.author: D7_fam

customer_reviews.title: Stiff uncomfortable fabric
customer_reviews.text: These were not like the other Tom shies I’ve owned , they were stiff and unbending, very uncomfortable, also I ordered size 8 and was sent an 8W. I had to return them .
customer_reviews.author: Nora M .

customer_reviews.title: Too Big
customer_reviews.text: I ended up keeping these because I really like them and I don't like dealing with returning things, but they are a little too big. I usually wear a size 9 1/2, even in Toms, but for some reason these Toms were too big. I would recommend ordering 1/2 size smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Walti

customer_reviews.title: Misleading listing but TOMS is always a good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This would have been 5 stars if I had gotten the style that I ordered. I ordered what is in the picture but got Natural Espadrille Alpargata metallic canvas with rope sole. I was satisfied with the style that I got randomly so I kept it, but the styles really need to be put on separate listings. It’s unclear what a person is ordering and what they will receive, as other reviews and customer questions also mention.
customer_reviews.author: N. Webster

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, comfy shoes!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe colour is absolutely gorgeous. It fits a tad bit small, maybe I would go half a size up my regular 6.5 to a 7 but I love it nonetheless. It’s beautiful. And extremely comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marlena

customer_reviews.title: TOMS feel so good
customer_reviews.text: TOMS are the best if you want comfortable shoes that last forever and feel great. Love the fun design on this pair and they are perfect for travel or just taking a stroll. I get lots of compliments on these.
customer_reviews.author: happygolucky

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I had these shoes in my cart for months, debating whether or not I wanted to spend $60 on a pair of shoes. I finally gave in and ordered them - THEY ARE WORTH THE MONEY! These shoes are so comfortable and cute. The sole inside is so comforting and supportive! These are my new go to shoes, and they go with every outfit! I HIGHLY recommend getting these - you won't regret it! (They are true to size - I am a 7.5)
customer_reviews.author: Torrey Parodi

customer_reviews.title: Oh my
customer_reviews.text: Sooooo cute. The cutest toms I’ve ever seen in my life. Couldn’t be better. The fit is absolutely perfect. Again nothing could be better about these cuties.
customer_reviews.author: Kalin Alvey

customer_reviews.title: Fits large and foot slips out
customer_reviews.text: I like the look. However they fit a bit large. I am usually a 6.5. When I tried them on, the size fits, but my heel kept slipping out when I tried to walk. I think it may have to do with the fact that the material is a bit elastic. I will have to return them - considered exchanging for a size 6 but I think they may be too small so I'm not going to bother. Also it seems like they might get dirty easily. They're made of some kind of thick silky string and not more durable synthetic material like I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Breezy Summertime Shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful! I love Toms because they look nice enough to wear to work with slacks and cute enough for a summer music festival! These are the best kind because of the breathe-ability factor. My feet start suffocating in canvas Toms, but they catch a nice breeze with every step in these. The perfect summertime close-toed shoe. P.S. the toe is actually fully enclosed so you get the open-air feel without having to worry about offending anyone with your unpainted toesies! ;D
customer_reviews.author: manda

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: They feel a bit slim when first putting them on but once you break them in, they are super comfy. Ordered for pregnancy as they were recommended and they are easy to put on without any bending over. Makes my days so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best brand for slip on casual shoes
customer_reviews.text: Tom's are forever and always my favorite casual shoe. I'm on my 3rd pair because they are the most comfortable and easy to wear shoes that I have purchased.
customer_reviews.author: A. B.

customer_reviews.title: Metallic, not true natural
customer_reviews.text: I like these EXCEPT, they are metallic, and not true natural. I was disappointed when I pulled them out to see they have a shimmer. I didn’t read anywhere on the description that this product had that.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: Fit my narrow feet well and are easy to slip on and off. The color goes with everything and the shape is classic Toms which can be dressed up or down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super pretty
customer_reviews.text: great price. Just a bit on the tight side. Like all Tom's, you can't wear all day walking due to little arch support. But I still love them!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have never written one of these before. I bought Tom's shoes last year and was very pleased.. I bought two pairs this year. The quality is very poor, the sole is very flimsy. I am not prone to tripping, but I have tripped twice in these shoes. I won't return them for fear they will be recycled. I threw them in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: They look great. But these gave me an ankle pain on one of my feet. I lost the return window and can't return these now. I'm going back to my Skechers.
customer_reviews.author: Lifeislikethat

customer_reviews.title: Small Fit
customer_reviews.text: I always wear size 7 in Toms Shoes. This pair is way too small. I bought these in this blue color and dove grey. I reordered the grey in size 8. I hope they fit. I'm returning this blue pair. They are just as small as the grey pair but the blue is very bright. Not the color I thought they'd be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy. Fake
customer_reviews.text: THESE TOMS ARE FAKE! Do not buy. As someone who has worn toms for multiple years I was confused when my “normal” size did not fit at all. I then went to read more reviews that stated that these are fake and not real toms. Please do not buy and order from TOMS website.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Pollio

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Toms are super expensive and was looking for some that were hopefully on sale. These were so much cheaper than the ones on their website! And he loves them, fits just like normal toms with the same great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla Ford

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit true to size. I wear a 9 and ordered a 9. A smidge tight but after 2-3 wears fit like a dream. Highly recommend, so cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: scr8809

customer_reviews.title: Really narrow fit
customer_reviews.text: I have really slender feet and even my feet barely fit these shoes. I tried a 7 which is my normal size and ended up going with a 7.5, but it is still slightly too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Kremer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe but quality is mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and cool looking shoe but does not last very long. 4 weeks in and already see the wear and tear
customer_reviews.author: Ann & Al

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: The product is very nice, however the first day that used, one of the shoes it fell and the other has a seam mark. I would like to know if can you replace my order? I used before the same shoes and never had any issue
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Foam insert Makes foot smell
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a five star shoe if it had not been for the foam insert. I wanted a shoe made of natural fibers, but the foam insert creates a problem with a bare foot. Meaning it makes my feel stink. Other than that, I love the style and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: The force is strong with Tom
customer_reviews.text: I love Toms and would wear them every single day... if winter didn’t exist. I also love Star award and LOVE these shoes so much that I also ordered the black pair.
customer_reviews.author: Canuck

customer_reviews.title: No stretch at all.
customer_reviews.text: Aaargh... tried to love ‘em but i got blisters by my big toe. I should have gotten Wide. I normally dont have issues with regular size. It was too tight and it didn't have any stretch in it even after wearing it for 4 hours of disney walking. Now its garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Melinda

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, LOVE these shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I love my dove gray Tom's canvas shoes! Comfortable and I receive compliments on them every time I wear them. I loved these so much that I went back and bought another pair in a different color (faded black with mini white polka dots).
customer_reviews.author: Dacia Legge

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh
customer_reviews.text: I love the pattern and standard TOMs feel and wearability, but within just over a month, the bottoms of the shoes have begun peeling off already?!? Living in Alabama, the weather is mild at this time of the year, and they lay zero salt or chemicals out on the streets in preparation for snow. I've worn these consistently, but not any outrageous amount, in any inclement condition, on any harsh surfaces. Other than their lack of durability, which is really disappointing for TOMS, I love the look and feel. - Amazon User's Wife
customer_reviews.author: The 'Bama Hayfords

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I spent way too many years wearing knockoff Toms and now I finally understand how much more worth the money these shoes are. They are comfy and supportive and get me through a day running around at work. Super excellent spring and summer shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Just right shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and have gotten so many compliments about the design and color (dark blue with gray and white striped on side). So cute and quick drying when they get wet (by accident of course)
customer_reviews.author: Erin Driedger

customer_reviews.title: My favorite TOMS
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. I'm a size 6 for reference. The stripes are a nice touch. Very comfortable and matches everything.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki guarrasi

customer_reviews.title: The light blue are to die for
customer_reviews.text: They do feel a bit weird on my right foot as I'm driving. I feel the part where the sole meets the fabric. I think the light blue are super cute and they look expensive. Totally recommend them
customer_reviews.author: NINA IN THE CAPE

customer_reviews.title: Picture did not match what I received
customer_reviews.text: The picture above is NOT the shoe I received! What I received was a light blue sparkle and was very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Bu

customer_reviews.title: First time buyer
customer_reviews.text: This is my fist time purchasing Toms. They are a great looking shoe and they are pretty comfortable. I will say they seem a tad smaller/tighter than all my other size 7 flats. I was a little bummed that the insole is not removable (for th ability to insert orthopedic inserts of your own if needed). Not as comfy as I’d hoped, but still comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Candirobison

customer_reviews.title: Little too big.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t like other toms shoes. The size is slightly bigger. I don’t like it very much but made mistake of wearing it outside the first time, so couldn’t return.
customer_reviews.author: Sculpture

product_meta.title: TOMS Men's Payton Grey Low-Top Sneakers
product_meta.description: Sneakers man TOMS men payton grey 10011772.
